CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 16, 1945, pg. 18, reads: "Junior Misses - Members of the Junior Tuberculosis League recently gave their first affair of the year, at the Loendi Club. The club does charitable work under the direction of the Senior League.  Club members, front row left to right, are Rosemary Robinson, Lois Schrader, Susan Fowler, Charlotte Primas, Florence Holmes and Emilene Hall.  Back row, left to right, are Ann Brown, Gussie Willima, Delores King, Helen Lee, Mirabelle Jackson, Martha Lee, Juanita Ashmond, Betty Brown, Beverly Moss, Mazie Wittington and Arlynn Williams. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Junior Tuberculosis League members, front row from left; Rosemary Robinson, Lois Schrader, Susan Fowler, Charlotte Primas, Florence Holmes, Emilene Hall; back row: Ann Brown, Gussie Willima, Delores King, Helen Lee (Shields), Mirabelle Jackson, Martha Lee (Saunders), Juanita Ashmond, Betty Brown, Beverly Moss, Mazie Wittington, and Arlynn Williams, in Loendi Club with glass block window in background
